sourcesContent:
<template>
  {{storageObject.name}}
</template>

<script>

export default {
  name: 'App',
  computed: {
    storageObject() {
      return this.availableStorages.find(
        (item) => item.code === this.activeStorage
      )
    },
  },

  data: () => ({
          availableStorages: [
        {
          name: "Local",
          code: "local",
          icon: "fas fa-hard-drive",
        },
        {
          name: "Amazon S3",
          code: "S3",
          icon: "fas fa-cloud",
        },
        ],
        activeStorage: "",
        storage: "local"
  }),
  mounted () {
    this.activeStorage = this.storage
  },
}
</script>
